name: Limbo Line
description:
Welcome to SSL, one of Limbo's many offices! Taking control of our protagonist, Nine, you must serve your sentence by taking on support calls from denizens of the multiverse. 

  • Help, harm, or hinder clients - then find out later how you impacted their lives

  • Chat with your fellow operators during break time and get to know them better

  • Try your luck dialling numbers on your desk phone (and discover hidden numbers throughout the game)

  • Play with your booth's PC

  • 34 CGs to unlock in the gallery (56 including variations)

  • Full English voice acting with realistic telephone calls (audio is designed for headphones)

  • Choose between a feminine or a masculine voice for your manager

  • 9 different endings depending on your choices (6 bad ends, 1 'true' end, and 2 secret ends)

  • Gender-neutral protagonist

Limbo Line contains a combination of dark humour and psychological horror. New recruits are advised to take heed of the following warnings:

  • Bad language
  • Threatening behaviour
  • References to self-harm & suicide
  • References to abortion
  • Mild sexual references
  • Depictions of blood
  • Disturbing sounds
  • Mild flashing lights
  • Possible jump scares
  • Loss of life

If you feel unsure about any of the above, please consider carefully if working at SSL is the best choice for you.

Thank you so much to everyone on the team! You're all incredible and I couldn't have done this without you :3 You've all helped me bring Limbo to life and I love you all <3

Need a walkthrough for the game? Go here!

Having trouble opening the game on Mac? Check out this post containing all the information I've managed to gather from helpful Mac users and general web scouring.

General Controls: 
Spacebar/mouseclick/scrollwheel = advance
Scrollwheel also rewinds
L = Log
H = Hide the text box

To report any pesky bugs or typos, head here to see what I'm already aware of + to submit new reports.

If you need help with anything, or just wanna drop me a message about the game, feel free to post a comment, or send me an email: melancholicmarionette@gmail.com

If you enjoyed playing through the game (or even if you didn't xD), I'd really appreciate hearing your feedback in the comments + ratings are much appreciated too ^-^

This game will always be available to download for free, if you enjoyed playing it, you're welcome to buy me a coffee, or support other projects I'm working on by becoming a patron :3 

I couldn't have made this game alone, please also consider supporting the amazing people who helped me bring Limbo to life <3
